name: Viva La Virus
description:
Weekly Game Jam Theme: "Life Is Short"

You and your virus friend have been separated! Meet back together using your special powers as quickly as possible. You must use your abilities, but each use costs you time- use them wisely.

Controls Arrow KeysMove (Player 1)Enter/ReturnExplode (Player 1): destroy firewallsWASDMove (Player 2)SpacebarDash (Player 2): move past firewalls Credits ArtMaddie Damp [LaMysteryPersona]ProgrammersJosh Baker, Josh Powlison
